definitions.definition: Great anger ; ( countable ) an instance of this.
examples: Homer relates an episode in the Trojan War that reveals the tragic consequences of the wrath of Achilles .

definitions.definition: Punishment , retribution , or vengeance resulting from anger; ( countable ) an instance of this.

main_definition: ( uncountable , formal ) Great anger ; ( countable ) an instance of this.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Punishment , retribution , or vengeance resulting from anger; ( countable ) an instance of this.
( uncountable , obsolete ) Great ardour or passion .
